Package kademlia

Class KadServer

java.lang.Object
kademlia.KadServer
public class KadServer
extends java.lang.Object
The server that handles sending and receiving messages between nodes on the Kad Network

  • Constructor Details

    • KadServer

      public KadServer​(int udpPort, KademliaMessageFactory mFactory, Node localNode, KadConfiguration config, KadStatistician statistician) throws java.net.SocketException
      Initialize our KadServer
      Parameters:
      udpPort - The port to listen on
      mFactory - Factory used to create messages
      localNode - Local node on which this server runs on
      config -
      statistician - A statistician to manage the server statistics
      Throws:
      java.net.SocketException

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public int sendMessage​(Node to, Message msg, Receiver recv) throws java.io.IOException, KadServerDownException
      Sends a message
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to send
      to - The node to send the message to
      recv - The receiver to handle the response message
      Returns:
      Integer The communication ID of this message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      KadServerDownException

    • reply

      public void reply​(Node to, Message msg, int comm) throws java.io.IOException
      Method called to reply to a message received
      Parameters:
      to - The Node to send the reply to
      msg - The reply message
      comm - The communication ID - the one received
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

      Stops listening and shuts down the server
